revised_title: General Comments on the Evolution and Design of Animal Signaling Systems
tldr: This article discusses the evolution and design of animal signaling systems, emphasizing the importance of understanding the factors affecting signal generation, transmission, and reception. It highlights the need to consider the content and structure of signals, as well as the environmental factors that influence their evolution. The article also explores the role of strategies and efficacy in animal communication systems and the impact of coevolution on signal design.
